table.pyName: (select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='付款方式' and sjgl='1')
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='DRP_CMPL_ADVS_PRD_PRO_TYPE' )

table.lgName: 分销-订货订单维护状态

table.pyName: (select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='付款方式' and sjgl='1')

table.lgName: 出库差异确认单据类型

table.pyName: (select b.DATA_DTL_NAME,b.DATA_DTL_CODE from project_data_dictionary a left join project_data_dictionary_dtl b on a.data_id=b.data_id and b.delflag=0 and a.delflag=0 where a.data_name='商场位置类别' order by b.data_dtl_id desc )

(select b.DATA_DTL_NAME,b.DATA_DTL_CODE from project_data_dictionary a left join project_data_dictionary_dtl b on a.data_id=b.data_id and b.delflag=0 and a.delflag=0 where a.data_name='装修性质' order by b.data_dtl_id asc )

(select b.DATA_DTL_NAME,b.DATA_DTL_CODE from project_data_dictionary a left join project_data_dictionary_dtl b on a.data_id=b.data_id and b.delflag=0 and a.delflag=0 where a.data_name='经营品牌' order by b.data_dtl_id asc )

field.text: 单一商场内新增第一家品牌店
单一商场内新增第二家品牌店
单一商场内新增第三家品牌店
单一商场内新增第四家及以上品牌店

table.pyName: (select b.DATA_DTL_NAME,DATA_DTL_CODE from project_data_dictionary a left join project_data_dictionary_dtl b on a.data_id=b.data_id where a.data_name='转撤店类型')
( select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'COST_TYPE' )

field.text: 标志材质、安装、色彩是否符合公司要求
field.value: 标志材质、安装、色彩是否符合公司要求

table.lgName: 区域服务中心销售出库状态

table.pyName: (select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'CHAA_LVL' )
(select DATA_NAME,DATA_TYPE,DATA_VAL,DEL_FLAG,LEDGER_ID,IS_DEAL_FLAG from DRP_DATA_CONF where DATA_TYPE = '付款方式')
( select b.SJXMC,b.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZDMX b left join T_SYS_SJZD a on a.SJZDID=b.SJZDID where a.STATE='启用' and a.SJZDMC='车型' and a.DELFLAG = 0 and b.DELFLAG=0)
( select b.SJXMC,b.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZDMX b left join T_SYS_SJZD a on a.SJZDID=b.SJZDID where a.STATE='启用' and a.SJZDMC='购物车-单据类型' and a.DELFLAG = 0 and b.DELFLAG=0)

(select b.DATA_DTL_CODE,b.DATA_DTL_NAME RANK_NAME,b.DATA_DTL_DES_1 RANK_VALUE from project_data_dictionary a left join project_data_dictionary_dtl b on a.data_id=b.data_id where a.data_name='渠道排名' and b.delflag=0 and a.delflag=0 and a.state='启用' order by b.data_dtl_id desc )

(select b.DATA_DTL_NAME NVALUE,b.DATA_DTL_NAME NTEXT from project_data_dictionary a left join project_data_dictionary_dtl b on a.data_id=b.data_id where a.data_name='付款批次' and b.delflag=0 and a.delflag=0 and a.state='启用' order by b.data_dtl_id desc )
(select b.SJXMC,b.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZDMX b left join T_SYS_SJZD a on a.SJZDID=b.SJZDID where a.STATE='启用' and a.sjzdbh='ERP_PRD_SEND_DELAY_TYPE' and a.DELFLAG = 0 and b.DELFLAG=0)
table.desc: 总部货品发运-延迟原因

table.pyName: (select t.DATA_DTL_ID,t.DATA_DTL_NAME from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL t left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY p on t.data_id = p.data_id where p.data_name = '渠道拜访填报项目' and t.delflag=0 and p.delflag=0 and t.par_data_dtl_id is null)
(select t.DATA_DTL_ID,t.DATA_DTL_NAME from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL t left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY p on t.data_id = p.data_id

(select t.DATA_DTL_ID,t.DATA_DTL_NAME from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL t left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY p on t.data_id = p.data_id where p.data_name = '门店拜访填报项目' and t.delflag=0 and p.delflag=0 and t.par_data_dtl_id is null)
(select t.DATA_DTL_ID,t.DATA_DTL_NAME from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL t left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY p on t.data_id = p.data_id where p.data_name = '拜访客户意向' and t.delflag=0 and p.delflag=0)

table.desc: 订单发货状态查询-报表

table.pyName: (select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='成本计算方式' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.sjzdmc='终端版本')

(select b.DATA_DTL_NAME,b.DATA_DTL_NAME DATA_DTL_CODE from project_data_dictionary a left join project_data_dictionary_dtl b on a.data_id=b.data_id and b.delflag=0 and a.delflag=0 where a.data_name='经营品牌' order by b.data_dtl_id asc )

table.pyName: ( select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'MARKETING_CARD_TYPE' )
( select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'ERP_BUDGET_ITEM_TYPE' )
(select t.BRAND NAME,t.BRAND VALUE from BASE_BRAND t where t.STATE='启用' and t.DEL_FLAG=0)
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'ERP_EXPENSE_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'ERP_EXPENSE_DTL_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'ERP_REBATE_CHANGE_REQ_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'ERP_ADVC_ORDER_BILL_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'CONTINUATION_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'STORE_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'CHANN_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'TERM_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'PORTAL_URL' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'REBATE_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'DRP_RETURN_RSON_TYPE' )
(select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'ADVS_SOURCE' )

table.lgName: 销售数据上报货品类型

table.pyName: (select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'CMPL_PRD_TYPE' )
( select a.SJXMC, a.SJXZ from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.SJZDID = a.SJZDID where u.DELFLAG = 0 and a.DELFLAG = 0 and u.STATE = '启用' and u.SJZDBH = 'BUSS_STATE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='YHLB' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROJECT_TYPE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='TRANSPORT' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='ORDER_STATE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROJECT_STATE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='LOWER_ORDER_STATE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,a.keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='SALE_TYPE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='SALE_ORDER_TYPE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROD_MATER' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROD_COLOR' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROD_GLASS' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROD_OTHER' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROD_TOWARD' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='QUESTION_STATUS' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='QUESTION_TYPE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,a.keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='HANDLE_RESULT' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='RESPONS_BELONG' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROGRESS_STATUS' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROJECT_ORDER' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROJECT_STATE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='ORDER_TYPE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='RETURN_STATE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PRO_SERIES' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='BILL_STATE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PROGRESS_STATUS' )

(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='AFTERSALE_CUPBOARD' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='DEPOSIT_TYPE' )
(select LEDGER_ID,LEDGER_NAME_ABBR,XTYHID from BASE_XTYH_LEDGER_CHRG where DEL_FLAG=0 )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='billType' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='PRO_PLACE' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,a.keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='SALE_ORDER_STATE' )

(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='AFTERSALE_ROBE' )

(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,to_number(a.keycode)keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='AFTERSALE_DOOR' )
(select a.sjxmc,a.sjxz,a.sjgl,a.keycode from T_SYS_SJZD u left join T_SYS_SJZDMX a on u.sjzdid = a.sjzdid where u.delflag=0 and a.delflag = 0 and u.state='启用' and u.SJZDBH='URGENCY_TYPE' )
